full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Title (English):
Janitorial Services - RCMP Black Lake Detachment

#### Title (French):
Services de nettoyage - Détachement de la GRC de Black Lake

#### Solicitation Number:
M5000-20-5871/A

#### Tender Closing Date:
2024-12-02 15:00:00

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites qualified suppliers to submit bids for the provision of janitorial services at the RCMP Black Lake Detachment in Black Lake, Saskatchewan. The contract duration is two years with an option to extend for an additional three years.

**Key Requirements:**

- Provide all necessary labor, materials, equipment, transportation, and daily site supervision for janitorial services
- Clean the RCMP Black Lake Detachment 5 days a week
- Meet the requirements outlined in the Invitation to Tender and Annex "A" - Janitorial Services

**Bid Evaluation Criteria:**
- Bids must comply with all requirements of the bid solicitation to be declared responsive
- The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for contract award

**Security Requirements:**

- This solicitation contains a security requirement; therefore, application security procedures must be implemented

**Site Visit:**
- A site visit is being offered for further details and information; refer to the Invitation to Tender for additional details

**Procurement Method:**
- Competitive - Open bidding

**Trade Agreements:**
- This solicitation is subject to various trade agreements, including the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and others

**Language of Submission:**
- Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French)

**Contact Information:**

- Sheena Simonson, Procurement Officer
- Phone: 306-515-1653
- Email: [sheena.simonson@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:sheena.simonson@rcmp-grc.gc.ca)
- Address: 6101 Dewdney Avenue, Regina, Saskatchewan S4P 3K7

**References:**

- Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB)
- Federal Indigenous Business Directory (IBD)

**Important Notice:**
- Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement
- Canada is not responsible and will not assume any liabilities for information found on third-party websites
